Params: {1: '1', 3: 'Aboard the aircraft leaving the giant tower, Sagawa and the elder are both quiet.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the Corrupted swarm and topple the white giant tower, they take one last look back.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Rest assured. Wuming City has agreed to take you in.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Babylonia will send supplies your way later.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elder', 3: "...So we're going to live under other people's roofs now, huh?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elder', 3: "Living in someone else's home means losing control over your own life."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elder', 3: "That's what I said to you when I kicked you out of my house."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sagawa', 3: "But sir, now that we're homeless, we shouldn't be dwelling on whose house we should live in."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sagawa', 3: "We should be glad we have a roof over our heads at all. As long as we stay alive, there's always hope, right?"}
